test.name: LDAPSupport.TC.003
test.description:
New entry send HTTP Request for the first time but the LDAP server is not up. - - - Annonymous user chosen.
Test Description: 1. Load LDAP and web servers 2. Send HTTP Get Proxy Request 3. Verify responses
Expected Result: - Verify that LDAP sends searchResDone (0 success), without msisdn, to XMP for its Authentication Request.
XTT Commands: startWebServer startLDAPServer 1. - Load ReqMod and workFlowConstants files 2. - sendGetRequest "http://www.724xtt.com/index/test1.html" 3. - checkResponseCode "HTTP 200" 4. - verify LDAP responses via logscan stopLDAPServer stopWebServer
test.steps: # Sleep 12 seconds for the configured timeout (10s) to end # Clean presence-store db # Restarting the LOGGER proc # Starting web server # Setting cache file # Send GET request # Checking response code # Query the response body # Sleep 3s for the transactiona logs to be written # Determine latest log # Writing transaction log to a file # Grep LDAP params from x.log # Validating "grep" response # Remove x.log # Stop web server
test.stepname: Sleep 12 seconds for the configured timeout (10s) to end
